meanings.definition: A Welsh festival of literature, music, and performance.
meanings.sent1: The eisteddfods showcased traditional Welsh music and poetry.
meanings.sent2: Many people attended the eisteddfods to enjoy the performances.
meanings.sent3: At the eisteddfods, the sheep even joined in the singing competition!
meanings.sent4: The eisteddfods were a colorful tapestry of Welsh culture.
meanings.sent5: The eisteddfods painted a vibrant picture of Welsh traditions.

meanings.definition: A competition or festival of Welsh culture, typically involving music and poetry.
meanings.sent1: Winning the eisteddfods was a great honor for the performers.
meanings.sent2: The eisteddfods brought together talented musicians and poets.
meanings.sent3: The eisteddfods turned into a friendly poetry battle between friends.
meanings.sent4: The eisteddfods were a battlefield of musical talents.
meanings.sent5: The eisteddfods were a celebration of Welsh creativity.

meanings.definition: An event or gathering celebrating Welsh arts and culture.
meanings.sent1: The community organized a lovely eisteddfods to honor their heritage.
meanings.sent2: The eisteddfods highlighted the richness of Welsh traditions.
meanings.sent3: The eisteddfods turned into a joyful dance party under the stars.
meanings.sent4: The eisteddfods were a beacon of Welsh pride.
meanings.sent5: The eisteddfods were a festive tribute to Welsh culture.
